title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Web-Based Programs for Enhancing Awareness of Design Problem-Solving Abilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced understanding of foundational design theory and scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Using the PROUD system, learners can complete five or more design problem-solving projects over 14 weeks
Learners can achieve a 20% or greater improvement in self-efficacy for problem-solving abilities through pre-post test comparisons
Learners can demonstrate the ability to structure complex design problems through project-based deliverables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
